name: Figmage
description:
Figmage makes it easy to embed your Figma designs on websites and in other places.


Just copy the link we provide and use it anywhere just like this:


<img src="https://figmage.com/myimage"/>


Publish your changes to update your images, and manage it all from Figma. You don't need to go back and forth from developer to designer to update assets anymore.


Why?


It's hard to get designs right on the first try, especially for the web.


Wrong sizes, mismatching colors or disagreement with the team. You're constantly exporting and uploading images.


Figmage gives you one link for your designs. Simply push your changes from Figma to use everywhere.


[Example]


Uses

Use it wherever you embed images. You can update a frame and push changes without sending new links.


  • Blog Posts
  • Social Media Covers
  • Link Previews
  • Slide Shows
